entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
